56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu 'Is-haq:A man asked Al-Bara "O Abu '`Umara! Did you flee on the day (of the battle) of Hunain?" Al-Bara replied while I was listening, "As for Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) he did not flee on that day. Abu Sufyan bin Al- Harith was holding the reins of his mule and when the pagans attacked him, he dismounted and started saying, 'I am the Prophet, and there is no lie about it; I am the son of `Abdul Muttalib.' On that day nobody was seen braver than the Prophet

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قَالَ خُذْهَا وَأَنَا ابْنُ فُلاَنٍ
chapter.eng-name: Saying: "Take it! I am the son of so-and-so."
